verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w If|strong="H1931"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* sin, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w commit|strong="H6680"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trespass \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* deal falsely \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbor \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* matter \w of|strong="H1121"\w* deposit, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* bargain, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* robbery, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* oppressed \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbor,

\w or|strong="H5930"\w* \w have|strong="H3548"\w* found \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w which|strong="H4196"\w* \w was|strong="H1320"\w* lost, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* deal falsely therein, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* swear \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lie; \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H7760"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H7760"\w* things \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1320"\w* \w doeth|strong="H7760"\w*, sinning therein;

\w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H3318"\w* \w shall|strong="H2889"\w* \w be|strong="H4725"\w*, if \w he|strong="H3318"\w* hath sinned, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w is|strong="H4725"\w* guilty, \w that|strong="H4725"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w shall|strong="H2889"\w* restore \w that|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H4725"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* robbery, or \w the|strong="H3318"\w* thing \w which|strong="H4725"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* hath gotten \w by|strong="H3318"\w* oppression, or \w the|strong="H3318"\w* deposit \w which|strong="H4725"\w* \w was|strong="H4725"\w* committed \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*, or \w the|strong="H3318"\w* lost thing \w which|strong="H4725"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* found,

\w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w anything|strong="H3808"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H4196"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w hath|strong="H3548"\w* sworn falsely; \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* restore \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* full, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* add \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fifth \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* thereto: \w unto|strong="H6999"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* whom \w it|strong="H5921"\w* appertaineth \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* give \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* being found guilty.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* bring \w his|strong="H5921"\w* trespass offering \w unto|strong="H4196"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ram \w without|strong="H3808"\w* blemish \w out|strong="H3518"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* flock, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* estimation, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trespass offering, \w unto|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* priest:

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* make atonement \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* forgiven \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* whatsoever \w he|strong="H3068"\w* doeth \w so|strong="H7126"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* guilty thereby.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* Moses, saying,

Command Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, saying, \w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* law \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H4480"\w*: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* hearth upon \w the|strong="H4480"\w* altar \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w night|strong="H1121"\w* \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* morning; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fire \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* altar \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* kept burning thereon.

\w And|strong="H2403"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* linen garment, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* linen breeches \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* flesh; \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ashes whereto \w the|strong="H5414"\w* fire \w hath|strong="H5414"\w* consumed \w the|strong="H5414"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* altar, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* beside \w the|strong="H5414"\w* altar.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* off \w his|strong="H3605"\w* garments, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* garments, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* carry forth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ashes \w without|strong="H2145"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* camp \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* clean \w place|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire upon \w the|strong="H3068"\w* altar \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* kept burning thereon, \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H1696"\w*; \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* burn wood \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w every|strong="H3068"\w* morning: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* lay \w the|strong="H3068"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* order upon \w it|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* burn thereon \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fat \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peace \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w*.

Fire \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* kept burning \w upon|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* altar \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*; \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w go|strong="H7126"\w* out.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* law \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w meal|strong="H4503"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* altar.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H6213"\w* \w up|strong="H6213"\w* therefrom \w his|strong="H3068"\w* handful, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fine|strong="H6213"\w* flour \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* meal \w offering|strong="H6999"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* oil \w thereof|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* frankincense \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* meal \w offering|strong="H6999"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* altar \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sweet savor, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* memorial \w thereof|strong="H3548"\w*, \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H3548"\w* \w thereof|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons eat: \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* eaten \w without|strong="H3808"\w* leaven \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy \w place|strong="H1961"\w*; \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* court \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tent \w of|strong="H3605"\w* meeting \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* baked \w with|strong="H3068"\w* leaven. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* given \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* portion \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire; \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H3068"\w* holy, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* trespass \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3068"\w* \w male|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H8451"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \add his\add* \w portion|strong="H6944"\w* forever \w throughout|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* generations, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire: whosoever toucheth \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* spake unto Moses, saying,

\w This|strong="H6942"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H6918"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons, \w which|strong="H4725"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* offer \w unto|strong="H5060"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w when|strong="H5060"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* anointed: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tenth \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H6918"\w* fine flour \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* meal offering \w perpetually|strong="H3605"\w*, half \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* half thereof \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evening.

\w On|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* baking pan \w it|strong="H7665"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w made|strong="H3627"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* oil; \w when|strong="H7665"\w* \w it|strong="H7665"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* soaked, thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7665"\w* \w it|strong="H7665"\w* \w in|strong="H7665"\w*: \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w baked|strong="H1310"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* shalt thou offer \w the|strong="H7665"\w* meal offering \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sweet savor \w unto|strong="H4325"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* anointed \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H2145"\w* \w in|strong="H2145"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* stead \w from|strong="H2145"\w* among \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* offer \w it|strong="H1931"\w*: \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* statute \w forever|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H2145"\w* \w wholly|strong="H3605"\w* burnt unto \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1818"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* meal \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w wholly|strong="H3605"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w*: \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten.
And \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* spake unto Moses, saying,

Speak unto Aaron and to his sons, saying, This is the law of the sin offering: in the place where the burnt offering is killed shall the sin offering be killed before \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: it is most holy.
The priest that offereth it for sin shall eat it: in \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy place shall it be eaten, in the court of the tent of meeting.

Whatsoever shall touch the flesh thereof shall be holy; and when there is sprinkled of the blood thereof upon any garment, thou shalt wash that whereon it was sprinkled in \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy place.
But the earthen vessel wherein it is boiled shall be broken; and if it be boiled in \w a|strong="H3068"\w* brazen vessel, it shall be scoured, and rinsed in water.
Every male among the priests shall eat thereof: it is most holy.
And no sin offering, whereof any of the blood is brought into the tent of meeting to make atonement in the holy place, shall be eaten: it shall be burnt with fire.
